ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: Severe sleep deprivation. Your body and brain need rest urgently.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Insufficient sleep. You risk impaired concentration and immune function.

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Slightly below recommended. Try to sleep a bit longer.

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: Optimal sleep duration for most adults.

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Excellent! Your body is getting the rest it needs.

ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: Sedentary lifestyle. Try to move more during the day.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Low activity. Take the stairs instead of the elevator.

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Moderate activity. You're on the right track!

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: Good activity level. Keeping you healthy and active.

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Excellent! You're exceeding the recommendations.

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Athletic level! Your heart is very efficient.

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: Good cardiovascular health. Keep exercising!

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Normal resting heart rate. Regular exercise can lower it.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Slightly elevated. Consider more cardio training.

ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: High resting heart rate. Consult a doctor if this persists.

ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: Very low HRV. Your body may be stressed or overtrained.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Low HRV. Prioritize recovery and stress management.

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Average HRV. There's room for improvement.

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: Good balance between stress and recovery.

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Excellent HRV! Your body handles stress well.

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Calm and controlled breathing. Sign of good fitness.

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: Normal respiratory rate for adults at rest.

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Within normal range. Try deep breathing to lower it.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Slightly elevated. May indicate stress or illness.

ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: High respiratory rate. Seek medical attention if persistent.

ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: Critically low! Seek immediate medical attention.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Low oxygen saturation. Contact a doctor.

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Slightly below optimal. Monitor the trend.

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: Normal oxygen saturation. Everything looks good.

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Optimal oxygen saturation! Excellent lung function.

ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: Low fitness. Start with light exercise and build up gradually.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Below average. Regular exercise is needed.

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Average fitness level for adults.

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: Good fitness! You exercise regularly.

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Athletic level! Excellent cardiovascular capacity.

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Athletic level. Low fat mass and good muscle definition.

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: Healthy level. Good balance between fat and muscle.

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Average. Room for improvement.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Slightly elevated. Focus on diet and exercise.

ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: High body fat percentage. Risk of health issues.

ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: Minimal activity. Try to move more during the day.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Low activity. Add a short walk to your day.

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Moderate activity. You're on the right track.

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: Good activity level. Keep it up!

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Excellent! You're very active today.

exerciseMinutes.name: Exercise Minutes
exerciseMinutes.description: Minutes of moderate to high intensity exercise

ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: Almost no exercise. Your body needs movement.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Little exercise. Aim for at least 30 minutes daily.

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Halfway to the daily goal. Keep moving!

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: You're meeting WHO recommendations. Well done!

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Impressive! You exercise more than most people.

ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: Very little deep sleep. Your body can't recover properly.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Insufficient deep sleep. Avoid alcohol and screens.

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Slightly below optimal. Improve your sleep hygiene.

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: Good amount of deep sleep for physical recovery.

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Excellent deep sleep! Optimal for muscle recovery.

ranges.label: Very Poor
ranges.comment: Very little REM sleep. Affects memory and learning.

ranges.label: Poor
ranges.comment: Low REM percentage. Try sleeping longer periods.

ranges.label: Fair
ranges.comment: Acceptable level. REM increases towards morning.

ranges.label: Good
ranges.comment: Good REM sleep for cognitive recovery.

ranges.label: Excellent
ranges.comment: Excellent! Optimal for memory and creativity.
